fields.name: BytesToCapturePerPacket
fields.description: Number of bytes captured per packet, the remaining bytes are truncated.

fields.name: Filters
fields.description: A list of packet capture filters.

fields.name: Scope
fields.description: A list of AzureVMSS instances which can be included or excluded to run packet capture. If both included and excluded are empty, then the packet capture will run on all instances of AzureVMSS.

fields.name: StorageLocation
fields.description: The storage location for a packet capture session.

fields.name: Target
fields.description: The ID of the targeted resource, only AzureVM and AzureVMSS as target type are currently supported.

fields.name: TargetType
fields.description: Target type of the resource provided.

fields.name: TimeLimitInSeconds
fields.description: Maximum duration of the capture session in seconds.

fields.name: TotalBytesPerSession
fields.description: Maximum size of the capture output.
